list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a building equipped with machinery for grinding grain into flour.
a building fitted with machinery for a manufacturing process.
a boxing match or a fistfight.
grind or crush (something) in a mill.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hard wheats are easily milled into white flour
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lúa mì cứng dễ dàng được xay vào bột trắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut or shape (metal) with a rotating tool.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the machine shop we mill and grind the castings
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong cửa hàng máy, chúng tôi nghiền và xay các vật đúc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of people or animals) move around in a confused mass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: people milled about the room, shaking hands
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: người ta xay về căn phòng, bắt tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: thicken (wool or another animal fiber) by fulling it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: ordinary wool blankets are made by milling a woven wool fabric
